trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to control access to objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs).
trans-unit.target: 提供控制物件而不需直接管理存取控制清單 (Acl) 的存取權的能力。

trans-unit.source: This class is the abstract base class for the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的基底類別，如<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity"></xref>和<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonSecurityDescriptor"></xref>of the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonSecurityDescriptor"></xref>新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is a container object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件是容器物件。

trans-unit.source: True if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is a directory object.
trans-unit.target: True，否則新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件是目錄物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the securable object associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>與此相關聯的安全性實體物件<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type of the securable object associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 與此相關聯的安全性實體物件類型<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref>類別，以指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the access rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 識別套用存取規則。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 此規則的存取遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 存取遮罩是 32 位元集合的匿名位元，其中的意義由個別的積分器所定義。

trans-unit.source: true if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個規則繼承自父容器為 true。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定存取規則的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited access rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自動傳播繼承的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if `inheritanceFlags` is set to <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略傳播旗標`inheritanceFlags`設<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the valid access control type.
trans-unit.target: 指定有效的存取控制類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref>這個方法會建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the access rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指定是否與此相關聯的存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件已經過修改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the access rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object have been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果與這個關聯的存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件已被修改過，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the object associated with the access rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>物件之存取規則相關聯的<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> object must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>物件必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type of the object associated with the access rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 與此存取規則相關聯的物件類型<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether the access rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object are in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指定是否與此相關聯的存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件為標準順序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the access rules are in canonical order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取規則是標準順序。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is protected.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指定是否與此相關聯判別存取控制清單 (DACL) <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"> </xref>受保護的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the DACL is protected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 DACL 受到保護。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether the audit rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object are in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指定是否與此相關聯的稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件為標準順序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the audit rules are in canonical order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果稽核規則是標準順序。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is protected.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指定系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 要與此相關聯<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>受保護的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SACL is protected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 SACL 受到保護。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref>類別，以指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the audit rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 識別要套用稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 此規則的存取遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 存取遮罩是 32 位元集合的匿名位元，其中的意義由個別的積分器所定義。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個規則繼承自父容器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定稽核規則的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited audit rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自動傳播繼承的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if `inheritanceFlags` is set to <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略傳播旗標`inheritanceFlags`設<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the conditions for which the rule is audited.
trans-unit.target: 指定稽核規則的條件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref>這個方法會建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the audit rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指定是否與此相關聯的稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件已經過修改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the audit rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object have been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果與這個關聯的稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件已被修改過，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> object associated with the audit rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>物件之稽核規則相關聯<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> object must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>物件必須是可以轉換成物件<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type of the object associated with the audit rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個稽核規則相關聯的物件型別<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the primary group associated with the specified owner.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定的擁有者相關聯的主要群組。

trans-unit.source: The owner for which to get the primary group.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的主要群組擁有者。

trans-unit.source: The primary group associated with the specified owner.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的擁有者相關聯的主要群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets the owner associated with the specified primary group.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定的主要群組相關聯的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: The primary group for which to get the owner.
trans-unit.target: 為其取得擁有者的主要群組。

trans-unit.source: The owner associated with the specified group.
trans-unit.target: 與指定的群組關聯的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: targetType is .
trans-unit.target: targetTypeis .

trans-unit.source: targetType is not an type.
trans-unit.target: targetType不是型別。

trans-unit.source: Some or all identity references could not be translated.
trans-unit.target: 無法轉譯某些或所有識別參考。

trans-unit.source: A Win32 error code was returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 Win32 錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of byte values that represents the security descriptor information for this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的位元組值陣列，表示這個安全性描述元資訊<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the security descriptor information currently in memory.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回的安全性描述元資訊目前在記憶體中。

trans-unit.source: It does not retrieve information saved in permanent storage.
trans-unit.target: 它不會擷取儲存在永久存放區的資訊。

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that represents the security descriptor for this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 位元組值陣列，表示這個安全性描述元<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no security information in this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有在此安全性資訊<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) representation of the specified sections of the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與此相關聯的安全性描述元指定區段的 Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) 表示<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which sections (access rules, audit rules, primary group, owner) of the security descriptor to get.
trans-unit.target: 指定要取得的安全性描述元區段 （存取規則、 稽核規則、 主要群組、 擁有者）。

trans-unit.source: The SDDL representation of the specified sections of the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 與此相關聯的安全性描述元指定區段的 SDDL 表示法<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the group associated with the securable object has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指定是否已修改與安全物件相關聯的群組。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the group associated with the securable object has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已修改與安全物件相關聯的群組。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is a container object.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指定是否這<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件是容器物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is a container object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件是容器物件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is a directory object.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指定是否這<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件是目錄物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object is a directory object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件是目錄物件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object can be converted to the Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format.
trans-unit.target: 傳回布林值，指定是否與此相關聯的安全性描述元<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件可以轉換成安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 格式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object can be converted to the Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果與此相關聯的安全性描述元<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件可以轉換為安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 格式，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定的修改來判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 與此相關聯<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 DACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 DACL。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 DACL。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定的修改來判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 與此相關聯<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 DACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 DACL。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 DACL。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定至系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 與此相關聯的修改套用<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the SACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 SACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 SACL;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 SACL;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定至系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 與此相關聯的修改套用<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the SACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 SACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 SACL;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功修改 SACL;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the owner of the securable object has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指定是否已修改安全物件的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the owner of the securable object has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已修改安全物件的擁有者;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves the specified sections of the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object to permanent storage.
trans-unit.target: 儲存與此相關聯的安全性描述元指定的區段<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>到永久儲存體的物件。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that the values of the includeSections parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議的值 includeSections 參數傳遞至建構函式和保存方法完全相同。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: When persisting a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object, if the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> method is not identical to the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the constructor used to create that <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object, sections of the persisted <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object can contain unpredictable values.
trans-unit.target: 保存時<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件，如果值`includeSections`參數傳遞至<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A>方法不是相同的值`includeSections`參數傳遞至建構函式用來建立一份<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件、 的永續性區段<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件可以包含無法預期的值。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a constructor is called with an `includeSections` value of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>, and later a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> method is called on that object with an `includeSections` value of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>, the resulting persisted <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object will contain unpredictable values for its audit rules, group, and owner.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果呼叫建構函式時所使用`includeSections`值<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>，及更新版本<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A>與該物件上呼叫方法`includeSections`值<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>，所產生的保存<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件將包含無法預期的值，針對其稽核規則、 群組和擁有者。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>

trans-unit.source: The handle used to retrieve the persisted information.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼，用來擷取保存的資訊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to save.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>列舉值，指定要儲存之安全物件的安全性描述元 （存取規則、 稽核規則、 擁有者、 主要群組） 的區段。

trans-unit.source: Saves the specified sections of the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object to permanent storage.
trans-unit.target: 儲存與此相關聯的安全性描述元指定的區段<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>到永久儲存體的物件。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that the values of the includeSections parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議的值 includeSections 參數傳遞至建構函式和保存方法完全相同。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: When persisting a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object, if the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> method is not identical to the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the constructor used to create that <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object, sections of the persisted <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object can contain unpredictable values.
trans-unit.target: 保存時<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件，如果值`includeSections`參數傳遞至<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A>方法不是相同的值`includeSections`參數傳遞至建構函式用來建立一份<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件、 的永續性區段<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件可以包含無法預期的值。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a constructor is called with an `includeSections` value of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>, and later a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> method is called on that object with an `includeSections` value of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>, the resulting persisted <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object will contain unpredictable values for its audit rules, group, and owner.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果呼叫建構函式時所使用`includeSections`值<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>，及更新版本<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A>與該物件上呼叫方法`includeSections`值<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>，所產生的保存<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件將包含無法預期的值，針對其稽核規則、 群組和擁有者。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.Persist%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>

trans-unit.source: The name used to retrieve the persisted information.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取保存的資訊的名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to save.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>列舉值，指定要儲存之安全物件的安全性描述元 （存取規則、 稽核規則、 擁有者、 主要群組） 的區段。

trans-unit.source: Saves the specified sections of the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object to permanent storage.
trans-unit.target: 儲存與此相關聯的安全性描述元指定的區段<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>到永久儲存體的物件。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that the values of the includeSections parameters passed to the constructor and persist methods be identical.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議的值 includeSections 參數傳遞至建構函式和保存方法完全相同。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: When persisting a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object, if the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the Persist method is not identical to the value of the `includeSections` parameter passed to the constructor used to create that <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object, sections of the persisted <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object can contain unpredictable values.
trans-unit.target: 保存時<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件，如果值`includeSections`傳遞給持續性方法的參數不是相同的值`includeSections`參數傳遞至建構函式用來建立一份<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件、 的永續性區段<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件可以包含無法預期的值。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a constructor is called with an `includeSections` value of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>, and later a Persist method is called on that object with an `includeSections` value of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>, the resulting persisted <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> object will contain unpredictable values for its audit rules, group, and owner.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果呼叫建構函式時所使用`includeSections`值<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>，且稍後會與該物件上呼叫 Persist 方法`includeSections`值<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>，所產生的保存<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity>物件將包含無法預期的值，針對其稽核規則、 群組和擁有者。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable the privilege that allows the caller to take ownership of the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用允許呼叫端若要取得之物件的擁有權的權限。

trans-unit.source: The name used to retrieve the persisted information.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取保存的資訊的名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the sections of the security descriptor (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the securable object to save.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>列舉值，指定要儲存之安全物件的安全性描述元 （存取規則、 稽核規則、 擁有者、 主要群組） 的區段。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有指定相關聯的所有存取規則<xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> for which to remove all access rules.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>要移除的所有存取規則。

trans-unit.source: All access rules are not in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的存取規則都以標準順序排序。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules associated with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有稽核規則指定相關聯<xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> for which to remove all audit rules.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>要移除的所有稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: All audit rules are not in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的稽核規則都以標準順序排序。

trans-unit.source: Locks this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object for read access.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定這個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件的讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: Unlocks this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object for read access.
trans-unit.target: 解除鎖定這個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件的讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: Sets or removes protection of the access rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定或移除與此相關聯的存取規則保護<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Protected access rules cannot be modified by parent objects through inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 由父物件透過繼承，無法修改受保護的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to protect the access rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object from inheritance; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow inheritance.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要保護與此相關聯的存取規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>繼承; 物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示允許繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to preserve inherited access rules; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to remove inherited access rules.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要保留繼承存取規則。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示移除繼承的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored if `isProtected` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略如果`isProtected`是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to remove inherited rules from a non-canonical Discretionary Access Control List (DACL).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試從非標準判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 中移除繼承的規則。

trans-unit.source: Sets or removes protection of the audit rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定或移除與此相關聯的稽核規則保護<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Protected audit rules cannot be modified by parent objects through inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 受保護的稽核規則無法透過繼承父物件所修改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to protect the audit rules associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object from inheritance; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow inheritance.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要保護與此相關聯的稽核規則<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>繼承; 物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示允許繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to preserve inherited audit rules; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to remove inherited audit rules.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要保留繼承的稽核規則;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示移除繼承的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored if `isProtected` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數已忽略如果`isProtected`是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to remove inherited rules from a non-canonical System Access Control List (SACL).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試從非標準系統存取控制清單 (SACL) 移除繼承的規則。

trans-unit.source: Sets the primary group for the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定與此相關聯的安全性描述元的主要群組<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The primary group to set.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定主要群組。

trans-unit.source: Sets the owner for the security descriptor associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定與此相關聯的安全性描述元擁有者<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The owner to set.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定擁有者。

trans-unit.source: Sets the security descriptor for this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object from the specified array of byte values.
trans-unit.target: 這個設定的安全性描述元<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>從指定的位元組值陣列的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含二進位資料所代表的安全性描述元`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。

trans-unit.source: If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式修改權限 AEFA ACE 新增的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。

trans-unit.source: This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致不小心允許存取主體的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，應用程式應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes from which to set the security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 要從中設定安全性描述元的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified sections of the security descriptor for this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object from the specified array of byte values.
trans-unit.target: 這個設定的安全性描述元指定的區段<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>從指定的位元組值陣列的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the security descriptor represented by the binary data contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含二進位資料所代表的安全性描述元`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。

trans-unit.source: If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式修改權限 AEFA ACE 新增的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。

trans-unit.source: This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致不小心允許存取主體的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，應用程式應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes from which to set the security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 要從中設定安全性描述元的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The sections (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the security descriptor to set.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的安全性描述元區段 （存取規則、 稽核規則、 擁有者、 主要群組）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the security descriptor for this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object from the specified Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) string.
trans-unit.target: 這個設定的安全性描述元<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>從指定的安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 字串的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the security descriptor represented by the SDDL string contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SDDL 字串所表示的安全性描述元包含`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。

trans-unit.source: If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式修改權限 AEFA ACE 新增的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。

trans-unit.source: This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致不小心允許存取主體的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，應用程式應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: The SDDL string from which to set the security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 要從中設定安全性描述元的 SDDL 字串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified sections of the security descriptor for this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object from the specified Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) string.
trans-unit.target: 這個設定的安全性描述元指定的區段<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>從指定的安全性描述元定義語言 (SDDL) 字串的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the security descriptor represented by the SDDL string contains `null` for its discretionary access control list (DACL), a single access control entry (ACE) that allows everyone full access (AEFA) is added to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SDDL 字串所表示的安全性描述元包含`null`其判別存取控制清單 (DACL)，單一的存取控制項目 (ACE)，可讓每個人對於完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 就會加入至 DACL。

trans-unit.source: If an application modifies the DACL of a security descriptor to which an AEFA ACE has been added, the AEFA ACE is persisted with the DACL when that DACL is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式修改權限 AEFA ACE 新增的安全性描述元的 DACL，權限 AEFA ACE 會保存使用 DACL，保存該 DACL。

trans-unit.source: This can result in an application unintentionally allowing access to principals.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致不小心允許存取主體的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, an application should check for the existence of an AEFA ACE and remove it before modifying any security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，應用程式應該檢查有權限 AEFA ACE 的並將其移除再修改任何安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: The SDDL string from which to set the security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 要從中設定安全性描述元的 SDDL 字串。

trans-unit.source: The sections (access rules, audit rules, owner, primary group) of the security descriptor to set.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的安全性描述元區段 （存取規則、 稽核規則、 擁有者、 主要群組）。

trans-unit.source: Locks this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object for write access.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定這個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件的寫入權限。

trans-unit.source: Unlocks this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref> object for write access.
trans-unit.target: 解除鎖定這個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity"></xref>物件的寫入權限。
